cont.entity_a: Better sound including simulated surround. Sound quality is fine with decent range. Superior to cheaper models with a very good discriminator minimizing noise. Excellent sound quality and performance. True hifi sound with good performance through an equalizer. Sound clarity and reception better than Advent brand.
cont.entity_b: Sound quality is not the greatest but acceptable. Sound quality is better than TV speakers. Sound quality surpasses built-in surround sound systems.

cont.entity_a: Better fit, wireless, and battery life with an extra battery always charged. Lightweight and comfortable. Fit may be uncomfortable for users with big ears.
cont.entity_b: Comfortable to the point of forgetting they're on. Snug fit could be improved. Loose fit on the head.

cont.entity_a: Proprietary battery not available at common stores. Battery life is less than four hours.
cont.entity_b: Excellent battery life. Battery life is shorter than expected but manageable with overnight charging. Battery life below advertised expectations with static build-up over time. Ni-MH batteries have short lifespan.

cont.entity_a: Poor construction with weak plastic joints.
cont.entity_b: Shorting out issues on one side after some time.

cont.entity_a: Good reception within a limited range. Reception cuts out when the phone rings.
cont.entity_b: Limited range from the base. Range is limited and signal drops even near the receiver.

Volume.comm: Volume control is difficult to find.

cont.entity_a: Volume is lower than expected for the price.
cont.entity_b: Volume control is difficult to find and use.

cont.entity_a: Stopped working after a short period, requiring repair or return. No problems with breakage or wear after one year of use.
Static occurs quickly when moving the head. Occasional static noise when moving the head.
cont.entity_b: Requires no obstructions between the headphones and base to avoid static. Background hiss and occasional out-of-phase issues. Background hiss can be significant and distracting.

cont.entity_a: Range is limited to about 1/3 acre.

cont.entity_b: Simple setup with fiber optic cable.

cont.entity_a: Occasional static and noise trade-off for wireless convenience.

cont.entity_b: Cannot use one headset while the other is charging.

cont.entity_a: Difficulties with warranty service due to manufacturer location.

cont.entity_b: Charging the headphones on the base is tricky and requires precision.
